biography: Erik, a familiar face from Ruukkigolf, brings a blend of enthusiasm and quiet determination to the greens. Though sometimes perceived as reserved, those who know Erik understand his dry wit and unwavering commitment to the sport.

Having participated in the Hector Trophée twice, Erik is still seeking his first victory at the event. While the Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Erik's dedication to improving his game is clear to all who have witnessed his progress over the years.
While Erik will not be participating in Hector Trophée 2025, his continued presence in the golfing community suggests that we may see him back on the course in future events.
